titles.title: Insular Areas Trade Enhancement Act
To amend the General Notes of the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States with respect to certain products imported from United States insular possessions.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 7/24/2007--Introduced. Insular Areas Trade Enhancement Act - Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to specifically provide for duty-free treatment of certain tuna and textile and apparel imported directly from U.S. insular possessions.
